entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 6:18 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
